title: Loving Hut - Thien Dang
typeOfFood: Vegan, Organic, Western, Fast food, Juice bar, Take-out, Vietnamese
description: Part of the international chain of vegan food restaurants opened by followers of Supreme Master Ching Hai, an advocate for veg living. Serves all vegan food, coffee, non-alcoholic beverages, and desserts. Spacious interior. Prices start from cheap to moderate.
streetAddress: Tran Thanh Tong 108, P15, Tan Binh District
